channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump declares war on the Fed, setting up a titanic struggle for world’s most important central bank
item.description: “President Trump purported to fire me ‘for cause’ when no cause exists under the law, and he has no authority to do so,” Cook said.

item.title: Trump says U.S. has much bigger leverage over China on magnets
item.description: “We have much bigger and better cards than they do,” Trump said. “If I played those cards, that would destroy China. I’m not going to play those cards...

item.title: TikTok calls her ‘32 pizzas mom.’ What her videos can teach us about spending.
Trump says he’s fired Fed governor Lisa Cook, in move to control central bank
Trump says he has fired Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
Southwest Airlines is going to start charging heavy flyers for an extra seat if they can’t fit within armrests
item.description: Currently, plus-size passengers can either pay for an extra seat in advance or they can request a free extra seat at the airport.

item.title: Epstein’s estate subpoenaed by House Oversight Committee
item.description: It's the latest effort by both Republicans and Democrats to respond to public clamor for more disclosure in the investigation into Epstein.

item.title: Musk sues Apple and OpenAI, accusing them of being ‘monopolists’ in AI space
item.description: The complaint portrays Apple as a company that views AI as an “existential threat” to its future success, prompting it to collude with OpenAI.

item.title: Robinhood misses out on yet another S&P 500 rebalance. Here's who will be added.
Market braces for Nvidia results as stocks struggle to extend Jackson Hole rally
